1.「エクセレント！ イメージした 自分の体格に| なれたんじゃない？ 元の体格に戻: Excellent~! Are you getting used to your new|image? If you ever want to change it again,|please come back! See you~!|<end>

2.「あら 体格を変えないの？ 残念だわ。| 今の体格から イメチェンしたくなったら: Oh, you don't want to change your look?|That's too bad. Please come back anytime|if you change your mind. See you~!|<end>

3.「あら お代が足りない みたいね。| 体格を変えるなら お代があるときに| また: Oh, it seems like you're a bit short on money.|If you want to change your look, come talk to|me again when you do have it. See you~!|<end>

Hi! This is the magic cosmetic... Magic|cosmetics can change your physique... But|they only work on humans. I'll take 3,000|
|gold for this.How would you like to change your physique|for 3,000 gold?|
